hebrewNER.util
Class Dictionary

java.lang.Object
  hebrewNER.util.Dictionary
public class Dictionary
extends java.lang.Object

Dictionary holds several volumes of a dictionary.
each volume is held as a hash table and has only one instance.

getDictionary

public java.lang.String getDictionary(java.lang.String ppw,
                                      java.lang.String pw,
                                      java.lang.String w,
                                      java.lang.String nw,
                                      java.lang.String nnw)
looks for the dictionary entry of the longest expression in a window of +-2 around current word.

Parameters:
ppw - - prev prev word, pw - prev word, w - current word, nw - next word nnw - next next word
Returns:
a string representing the dictionary entry, "#f" if not found
